00015 double TIME_EPSILON = 1e-7;
00016 
00017 STDMETHODIMP ThermalGrabber::SampleCB(double SampleTime, IMediaSample *pSample) {
00018         m_frameNumber = ceil(m_frameRate*SampleTime-TIME_EPSILON);
00019         // wait for the color image to be ready
00020         int SYNC_SLEEP_TIME = 1;
00021         while (colorGrabber->m_frameNumber < m_frameNumber)
00022                 ::Sleep( SYNC_SLEEP_TIME );
00023         CAutoLock thermalLock( &m_thermalCriticalSection); 
00024         BYTE*    pData;
00025         pSample->GetPointer(&pData);
00026         VIDEOINFOHEADER *pvi = (VIDEOINFOHEADER *) m_mediaType.pbFormat;
00027         int cxImage    = pvi->bmiHeader.biWidth;
00028     int cyImage    = abs(pvi->bmiHeader.biHeight);
00029     int stride     = (cxImage * sizeof( RGBTRIPLE ) + 3) & -4;
00030         // Copy the data
00031         cvSetImageData( imgVideo, pData, stride );
00032         cvCvtColor(imgVideo, imgThermal, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00033         if (pvi->bmiHeader.biHeight > 0)
00034                 cvFlip(imgThermal);
00035         return S_OK;    
00036 
00037 }       
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 HRESULT SequenceProcessor::SampleCB(double SampleTime, IMediaSample *pSample) {
00040         // compute current frame number
00041         if (pSample->IsPreroll() == S_OK)
00042                 AfxMessageBox("Preroll!!!");
00043         m_frameNumber = ceil(m_frameRate*SampleTime-TIME_EPSILON);
00044 
00045     BYTE*    pData;
00046         pSample->GetPointer(&pData);
00047         VIDEOINFOHEADER *pvi = (VIDEOINFOHEADER *) m_mediaType.pbFormat;
00048         int cxImage    = pvi->bmiHeader.biWidth;
00049     int cyImage    = abs(pvi->bmiHeader.biHeight);
00050     int stride     = (cxImage * sizeof( RGBTRIPLE ) + 3) & -4;
00051         // Copy the data
00052         cvSetImageData( imgVideo, pData, stride );
00053         cvCopy(imgVideo, imgFrame);
00054         if (pvi->bmiHeader.biHeight > 0)
00055                 cvFlip(imgFrame);
00056         return S_OK;    
00057 }

00086         //pGrabber->SetCallback(NULL,0);
00087         m_compatibleDCvideo.Detach();
00088         m_compatibleDCfloor.Detach();

00091         SafeRelease(pMScolor);
00092         SafeRelease(pWC);
00093         SafeRelease(pME);
00094         SafeRelease(pMixerImage);                               
00095         SafeRelease(pVmr);
00096         SafeRelease(pGrabberF);
00097         if (m_mode == THERMAL_COLOR_PAIR) {
00098                 SafeRelease(pMSthermal);
00099                 SafeRelease(pGrabberF);
00100                 delete thermalGrabber;
00101         }
00102         SafeRelease(pConfig);
00103         SafeRelease(pGraph);
00104         }

00327 void SequenceProcessor::IplImage2Overlay(IplImage* ipl, HBITMAP hBmp) {
00328         if (FAILED(::SetBitmapBits(hBmp, ipl->imageSize, ipl->imageData)) || FAILED(pMixerImage->SetAlphaBitmap(&m_bmpInfo))) {
00329 //      if (FAILED(::SetDIBits(NULL, hBmp, 0, ipl->height, ipl->imageData, NULL, DIB_RGB_COLORS)) || FAILED(pMixerImage->SetAlphaBitmap(&m_bmpInfo))) {
00330                 AfxMessageBox("Could not display overlay information", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00331                 Stop();
00332         }
00333 }
00334 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00335 void SequenceProcessor::Overlay2IplImage(HBITMAP hBmp, IplImage* ipl) {
00336         if (FAILED(::GetBitmapBits(hBmp, ipl->imageSize, ipl->imageData))) {
00337                 AfxMessageBox("Could not convert overlay to IplImage", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00338                 Stop();
00339         }
00340 }
00341 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00342 bool SequenceProcessor::SetBitmapImage(HBITMAP hBmp, LONG cx, LONG cy) {
00343         ZeroMemory(&m_bmpInfo, sizeof(m_bmpInfo) );    
00344         m_bmpInfo.dwFlags |= VMRBITMAP_HDC;// | VMRBITMAP_SRCRECT;
00345         m_compatibleDCfloor.SelectObject(hBmp);
00346         m_bmpInfo.hdc = m_compatibleDCfloor.m_hDC;
00347         m_bmpInfo.rSrc = CRect(0, 0, cx, cy);
00348         m_bmpInfo.rDest.left = 0; m_bmpInfo.rDest.right = 1.0;
00349         m_bmpInfo.rDest.top = 0; m_bmpInfo.rDest.bottom = 1.0;
00350     m_bmpInfo.fAlpha = 1;
00351         m_bmpInfo.dwFlags |= VMRBITMAP_SRCCOLORKEY; 
00352     m_bmpInfo.clrSrcKey = INVISIBLE_COLOR;
00353         if (FAILED(pMixerImage->SetAlphaBitmap(&m_bmpInfo))) {
00354                 AfxMessageBox("Could not display overlay information", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00355                 return false;
00356         }
00357         else
00358                 return true;
00359 }
00360 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00361 bool SequenceProcessor::DisplaySeekingCapabilities() {
00362         DWORD dwCap = 0;
00363         HRESULT hr1 = pMScolor->GetCapabilities(&dwCap);
00364         (AM_SEEKING_CanSeekAbsolute & dwCap) ? AfxMessageBox("Can seek absolute"):1;
00365         (AM_SEEKING_CanSeekForwards & dwCap) ? AfxMessageBox("Can seek forwards"):1;
00366         (AM_SEEKING_CanSeekBackwards & dwCap) ? AfxMessageBox("Can seek backwards"):1;
00367         if (AM_SEEKING_CanSeekAbsolute & dwCap)
00368                 return true;
00369         else 
00370                 return false;
00371 }

00407         pMC->GetState(msTimeout, &state);

00409 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00410 void SequenceProcessor::SetState(LONG msTimeout, OAFilterState& state) {
00411         if (state == State_Stopped)
00412         StopWhenReady();
00413     else if (state == State_Running)
00414         Run();
00415         else if (state == State_Paused)
00416                 Pause();    
00417 }
00418 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00419 void SequenceProcessor::SetRate(double rate) {
00420         pMScolor->SetRate(rate);
00421 }
00422 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00423 //************************************
00424 // Method:    SetPosition
00425 // FullName:  SequenceProcessor::SetPosition
00426 // Access:    public 
00427 // Returns:   void
00428 // Qualifier: test
00429 // Parameter: REFERENCE_TIME pos a reference time
00430 //************************************
00431 void SequenceProcessor::SetPosition(REFERENCE_TIME pos) {
00432         m_isSettingPositions = 1;
00433         if (pos == -1)
00434                 pos = m_frameNumber;
00435 
00436         HRESULT hr = pMScolor->SetPositions(&pos, AM_SEEKING_AbsolutePositioning,
00437                         NULL, AM_SEEKING_NoPositioning);
00438         if (m_mode == THERMAL_COLOR_PAIR)
00439                 HRESULT hr = pMSthermal->SetPositions(&pos, AM_SEEKING_AbsolutePositioning,
00440                         NULL, AM_SEEKING_NoPositioning);
00441 }
00442 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00443 REFERENCE_TIME SequenceProcessor::GetCurrentPosition() {
00444         HRESULT hr;
00445         REFERENCE_TIME pNow;
00446         hr = pMScolor->GetCurrentPosition(&pNow);
00447     if (FAILED(hr))
00448         return -1;
00449         else 
00450                 return pNow;
00451 }
00452 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00453 bool SequenceProcessor::IsPaused() {
00454         OAFilterState state;
00455         if( pMC->GetState( DELAY, &state ) == S_OK &&  state == State_Paused )
00456                 return true;
00457         return false;
00458 }
00459 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00460 bool SequenceProcessor::IsRunning() {
00461         OAFilterState state;
00462         if( pMC->GetState( DELAY, &state) == S_OK &&  state == State_Running )
00463                 return true;
00464         return false;
00465 }
00466 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00467 bool SequenceProcessor::IsStopped() {
00468         OAFilterState state;
00469         if( pMC->GetState( DELAY, &state ) == S_OK &&  state == State_Stopped )
00470                 return true;
00471         return false;
00472 }
00473 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00474 void SequenceProcessor::Clear() {

00478                 //OAFilterState state;

00480                 //WaitForSingleObject(::Win16Mutex,INFINITE);

00482                 //while (true) {
00483                 //      if( pMC->GetState( 500, &state ) == S_OK &&  state == State_Stopped )
00484                 //              break;
00485                 //}
00486                 removeAllFilters(pGraph);
00487         }
00488 }
00489 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00490 HRESULT SequenceProcessor::RepaintPosterFrame() {
00491         // notify the graph to repaint (this make it repaint even if it's not running)
00492         IMediaEventSink *pMediaSink;
00493         pGraph->QueryInterface(IID_IMediaEventSink, (void**)&pMediaSink);
00494         pMediaSink->Notify(EC_REPAINT, NULL, NULL);
00495         return S_OK;
00496 }
00497 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00498 HRESULT SequenceProcessor::ShowPosterFrame(HWND  hwnd, HDC  hdc) {
00499         // display poster frame
00500         echo(String::Format("repaint in {0}", m_frameNumber));
00501         return pWC->RepaintVideo(hwnd, hdc);
00502 }
00503 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00504 void SequenceProcessor::SetTransparency(int mTransLevel) {
00505         // Set the transparency value (1.0 is opaque, 0.0 is transparent). mTransLevel is from 0 to 100
00506         m_bmpInfo.fAlpha = (float)mTransLevel/100;
00507         pMixerImage->UpdateAlphaBitmapParameters(&m_bmpInfo);
00508 }
00509 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00510 void SequenceProcessor::SetVideoWindow(HWND  hwnd) {
00511         m_screenname = hwnd;
00512         pME->SetNotifyWindow ( ( OAHWND ) m_screenname, WM_GRAPHNOTIFY, 0 ) ;
00513         // specify the container window that the video should be clipped to
00514         pWC->SetVideoClippingWindow(m_screenname);
00515         //pWC->SetVideoClippingWindow(NULL);
00516 }
